description.hltext_display: Director Gordon Greenberg Talks About New Revision of Musical Working, Bowing in Chicago in 2011
description.author: Kenneth Jones
description.content:
Gordon Greenberg
Tickets are now on sale for the new spring 2011 Chicago production of Working, a revised version of the late-1970s musical inspired by Studs Terkel's book of oral histories of Americans and their occupations. Gordon Greenberg (Pirates! and the Happy Days musical) directs, and shared some thoughts about re-working the cult-hit title.
Broadway In Chicago and commercial producers Jed Bernstein, Dianne Fraser and Sheila Simon Geltzer announced initial casting for one-half of the six-actor company in September. Performances featuring Chicago stars E. Faye Butler, Barbara Robertson and Gene Weygandt begin Feb. 15, 2011, at the Broadway Playhouse at Water Tower Place in Chicago. Additional casting and creative-team members will be announced. Tickets are on sale to May 8, 2011, according to the Broadway In Chicago website.
This new Working is adapted by Wicked, Godspell and Pippin writer Stephen Schwartz (co-creator of the original production) and Nina Faso. Scenic design is by Beowulf Boritt.
The Windy City run is a test production leading to a wider commercial life for the refreshed 1978 Broadway show, which has contributions from a variety of pop and theatre songwriters. Some of the standouts from the original score include "Just a Housewife," "The Mason" and "It's an Art." Lin-Manuel Miranda, who won a Best Score Tony for In the Heights, has contributed two new songs to the project. Based on the book by Pulitzer Prize-winning author and Chicago hero Terkel, Working, according to the producers, is "a musical exploration of 26 people from all walks of life," with songs by all-star composers Craig Carnelia, Micki Grant, Tony Award-winning Lin-Manuel Miranda (In the Heights), Mary Rodgers, Susan Birkenhead, Stephen Schwartz and Grammy Award-winning James Taylor. "Working celebrates everyday people, fills you with hope and inspiration and is the perfect musical for anyone who has ever worked a day in their lives." Director Greenberg told Playbill.com, "Stephen and I first started talking about a new production of Working almost ten years ago, while we were in the midst of reworking The Baker's Wife with the wonderful Joe Stein. The initial idea was to update all the professions in favor of quirky uber-contemporary careers. It soon became clear, however, that the strength of the show was in the core truths that transcended specific professions that people's relationships to their work ultimately revealed key aspects of their humanity, regardless of the trappings of the job itself. So, although the show is still set in contemporary America, it contains timeless truths." The collaborators talked of doing the new production with just four people, "shrinking the cast for both ideological and practical reasons." Greenberg explained, "By having fewer actors playing more roles, we could further underline the notion that we are all the same under the skin that the urge to find meaning and transcendence through work is at the heart of every profession at every socioeconomic level." For developmental productions at Asolo Rep in Florida in May 2008 and The Old Globe in San Diego in March 2009, Greenberg explained, "We expanded the cast to six and featured more and more of the production [trappings] on stage from the stage manager to the dressers. Exposing the bones or 'workings' of the production became a key part of the excitement of this production. Watching actors transform in front of our eyes makes this a great platform for a group of six extraordinary actors and invites the audience into their process, watching on stage and backstage simultaneously." In developing the new version, Greenberg visited the Chicago Historical Museum "and was able to read through all of Studs Terkel's original interview transcripts," the director said. "We added new characters and text from his notes and documents, edited out others the show now runs just 90 minutes in one act cut several songs and added two fantastic new songs by Lin-Manuel Miranda" E. Faye Butler (Woman 2) is the winner of six Joseph Jefferson Awards. Her Chicago credits include Marriott's Lincolnshire Theatre's Little Shop of Horrors; The Goodman Theatre's A Christmas Carol; Steppenwolf Theatre's Crumbs From the Table of Joy; Court Theatre's Caroline or Change; Chicago Shakespeare's Seussical The Musical; and Victory Gardens Theatre's Blue Sonata. Barbara Robertson (Woman 3) played Madame Morrible in Wicked. Chicago credits include Goodman Theatre's The Goat, or Who is Sylvia?; Chicago Shakespeare's Kabuki Lady MacBeth; Court Theatre's House of Blue Leaves; Lookingglass Theatre's Hard Times; Steppenwolf's A Summer Remembered; and the national tour of Angels in America.
Gene Weygandt (Man 3) is perhaps best known as The Wonderful Wizard of Oz in the smash hit Wicked in Chicago and on Broadway. Winner of three Joseph Jefferson Awards, theatre credits include The Music Man, Me and My Girl, The Light In The Piazza, Hairspray, The Drowsy Chaperone, Don't Dress for Dinner and Lend Me a Tenor and Broadway's Big. The late Studs Terkel, an author and TV and radio host, was best known for his oral histories of ordinary Americans. "The Good War" and "Working: People Talk About What They Do All Day and How They Feel" were two of his best-sellers.

description.hltext_display: Vergewaltigungsprozess: Leichte Aufheiterung für den Angeklagten Kachelmann
description.author: Von Jochen Neumeyer
description.content:
Jörg Kachelmanns Verteidiger Johann Schwenn hat bislang einen gewissen Zweckpessimismus gezeigt, wenn es um die Zukunft seines prominenten Mandanten ging: Bislang habe ich keinen Anlass, an der Verurteilungsprognose der Kammer zu zweifeln“, sagte er stets.
Doch mittlerweile, nach 22 Verhandlungstagen, lassen sich leichte Hoffnungsschimmer für den Moderator erkennen.
Das könnte auch daran liegen, dass die lange Parade der Ex-Geliebten des Fernsehmoderators vor dem Landgericht Mannheim zumindest fürs erste unterbrochen wurde und damit auch die gerichtliche Erörterung seines Intimlebens. Diese rückte den Angeklagten in den Augen mancher in ein ungünstiges Licht.
Obwohl es, wie ein am Verfahren unbeteiligter Anwalt formulierte, in Mannheim nicht um den Vorwurf allgemeiner Fehlbehandlung von Frauen“ geht, sondern ausschließlich um die Frage, ob Kachelmann seine langjährige Geliebte Simone W. (Name geändert) mit einem Messer bedroht und vergewaltigt hat oder nicht.
In den letzten Verhandlungstagen vor der Winterpause nun beschäftigte sich das Gericht nicht mehr so sehr mit Charakterfragen, sondern mit der Auswertung konkreter Spuren. Hieraus ergibt sich, noch sehr schemenhaft und vorläufig, ein für Kachelmann etwas günstigeres Bild.
Es begann in der vergangenen Woche mit der Vernehmung des Münsteraner Rechtsmediziners Bernd Brinkmann. Dieser hatte im Auftrag der Verteidigung zahlreiche Experimente gemacht, um nachzuprüfen, ob die Verletzungen an Hals und Oberschenkeln von Simone W. zum Tatvorwurf passen.
So sollen die Blutergüsse an den Oberschenkeln entstanden sein, als Kachelmann mit den Knien ihre Beine auseinanderdrückte. Hierzu allerdings scheint die Form der Hämatome nicht zu passen. Brinkmann zog Vergleiche zu Verletzungen durch Faustschläge. Die sichelförmige Kontur ist bekannt von entsprechenden Verletzungen bei Kindesmisshandlungen“, so Brinkmann. Die mögliche, aber nicht ausgesprochene Folgerung: Simone W. könnte sich die Blutergüsse selbst zugefügt haben.
Am Montag wurde dann ein Sachverständiger des Landeskriminalamts Baden-Württemberg zur Auswertung der Tatortspuren befragt. Zentraler Gegenstand: Ein Küchenmesser mit einer 8,5 Zentimeter langen geriffelten Klinge. Nach den Schilderungen der Nebenklägerin soll Kachelmann sie mit dem Messer am Hals von der Küche ins Schlafzimmer gezerrt haben. Während der gesamten Vergewaltigung habe er ihr den Messerrücken an den Hals gedrückt. Simone W. hatte Schürfverletzungen am Hals.
Dann allerdings, so der Sachverständige, wären deutlichere Spuren zu erwarten gewesen zum einen von Kachelmann am Griff des Messers, zum anderen von Simone W. an der Klinge.
Doch weder an der Messerspitze noch am Rücken der Klinge finden sich nachweisbare DNA-Spuren, also auch nicht solche des mutmaßlichen Opfers. Es gibt keine Hinweise darauf, dass mit dem Rücken oder der Spitze Verletzungen herbeigeführt wurden“, so der LKA-Experte.
Bei allem Einsatz der Verteidigung: Ein wichtiger Hinweis kam von Staatsanwalt Lars-Torben Oltrogge. Dabei ging es um die Frage, ob vielleicht beim Transport des Messers Spuren verloren gegangen sein könnten etwa beim Verpacken in eine Plastiktüte.
Dies hätte die dürftige Spurenlage erklären können. Doch Oltrogge erinnerte sich: Das Messer war in einer speziellen Box transportiert worden, nicht in einer Tüte. Damit, so der Sachverständige, können wir das Thema Spurenverlust vernachlässigen“.
Schwenn blieb am Dienstag dennoch vorsichtig in seiner Bewertung. Zwar sah er Pluspunkte“ für seinen Mandanten. Dies sei jedoch kein Anlass, hier irgendwelche Prognosen zu wagen, dass es hier zu einem Freispruch kommen muss“.
Der Verteidiger bastelt bereits an den nächsten Geschützen gegen das Gericht: Nachdem die Richter am Dienstag seinen Antrag ablehnten, die Redaktionen der Zeitschriften Bunte“ und Focus“ durchsuchen zu lassen, will er nun über einen weiteren Befangenheitsantrag beratschlagen.
In diesem Verfahren wäre es der dritte gegen die Richter. Planmäßig soll der Prozess am 19. Januar fortgesetzt werden.Der Prozess gegen den Meteorologen und TV-Star Jörg Kachelmann macht Winterpause: Die Aussichten sind zwar nicht klar, trotz allem Ärger aber etwas freundlicher für den Moderator.

description.hltext_display: Cárteles forman alianza antizeta, revela informe
description.content:
Atribuye este aumento a dos factores: al enfrentamiento entre el cártel del Golfo y Los Zetas, y a la ofensiva lanzada por el presidente Felipe Calderón, que “interrumpió” el balance de poder entre los cárteles.
Afirma que el gobierno mexicano llegó a su límite y que no tiene los recursos para contener la acción de los cárteles de las drogas, y que por ello debería ampliar la participación de gobiernos extranjeros, para reforzar esta lucha.
“Con las elecciones de 2012 acercándose, los niveles sin precedentes de violencia resultan inaceptables para Calderón y el PAN, especialmente desde que ha hecho de la seguridad el centro de su presidencia”, destaca el documento de 21 cuartillas.
Asegura que a menos de que todos los cárteles sean decapitados para tenerlos bajo control, algo que sería poco probable, la única manera de reducir la violencia sería restaurando el equilibrio de poder entre estas organizaciones criminales.
“Calderón necesitará tomar los pasos hacia la restauración de este balance el próximo año si desea sofocar la violencia rumbo a las elecciones del 2012”, agrega el informe, que hace referencia al nacimiento de una alianza entre La Federación de Sinaloa, el cártel del Golfo y La Familia Michoacana para enfrentar a Los Zetas, denominada Nueva Federación.
De acuerdo con el mapa elaborado por esta organización integrada por profesionales sobre inteligencia, el cártel de Los Zetas tiene mayor presencia en el país, dominando los estados de Quintana Roo, Yucatán, Campeche, Tabasco, Veracruz, Tamaulipas, Nuevo León, la mitad de Chihuahua, parte de Chiapas y San Luis Potosí, y diversas localidades de Durango, Oaxaca y Zacatecas, e incluso en la parte norte y centro de Guatemala.
A La Federación de Sinaloa le concede gran parte de Chihuahua, Durango, Sinaloa, Nayarit, puntos específicos en Jalisco, Guanajuato, Zacatecas y Chiapas, y en zona norte de Sonora y Baja California.
En cuanto al cártel del Pacífico Sur, el informe lo ubica en una parte importante de Sonora, en diversos puntos de Sinaloa y en los límites de esta estado con Durango. También con una presencia notable en Jalisco y Colima, en la costa de Michoacán, en Guerrero, y puntos específicos en el estado de México e incluso en el Distrito Federal.
A La Familia Michoacana la ubica en Michoacán, con alguna presencia en los vecinos estados de Guanajuato y Guerrero.
Se destaca una franja en disputa entre Coahuila y Chihuahua, gran parte de San Luis Potosí y Guanajuato, Hidalgo, estado de México, el DF, casi todo Oaxaca y una parte de Guerrero, zonas amplias de Chiapas y áreas fronterizas de Tabasco,Campeche, y Quintana Roo.
Según Stratfor, Los Zetas están en la posibilidad de recuperar territorios perdidos.
“Los Zetas aparecen preparando un asalto para recuperar el territorio perdido (Reynosa, Nuevo Laredo y Monterrey), aunque el despliegue de fuerzas federales en la región posiblemente retrase o altere sus planes por una ofensiva anticipada”.
Aún así, visualiza que la Federación de Sinaloa podría llegar a ser la organización dominante en México el próximo año.

description.hltext_display: Los bombos de la Lotería de la Navidad empiezan a repartir ilusión
description.author: Diario de Ibiza
description.content:
El Sorteo Extraordinario de la Lotería de Navidad ha comenzado en el salón de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado, donde los niños del Colegio San Ildefonso ya cantan los números
VOTE ESTA NOTICIA
Lotería de Navidad: Pedrea | Sorteo | Historia | Comenta el sorteo | Lotería del Niño | Widget de la Lotería de Navidad
EP / MADRID El Sorteo Extraordinario de la Lotería de Navidad ha comenzado en el salón de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado, donde los niños del Colegio San Ildefonso ya cantan los números.
El nuevo salón de sorteos de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE) en el Palacio de Congresos se ha abierto alrededor de las 08:00 horas de la mañana para permitir la entrada a los espectadores y aproximadamente una hora más tarde comenzará el sorteo de Lotería de Navidad con la extracción de las bolas de los número y los premios por parte de los niños del Colegio San Ildefonso.
Previamente, anoche se hizo público el examen y recuento de las bolas de los números y premios, que pudieron ser comprobadas por los asistentes que lo desearon, previa petición y autorización del presidente. Finalizada la operación de recuento, se desalojó el salón y se aseguraron con cerrojos interiores todos sus accesos, a excepción de la puerta del estrado, cuyas llaves quedan en poder de tres diferentes claveros.
A las ocho de la mañana, se ha formado la primera mesa que supervisará el llenado de los bombos con las bolas ya colgadas de las liras y el protocolo durante el que el público en general ha podido, desde ese momento y antes de que comience el sorteo, comprobar que la bolita del número que juega está entre las 85.000 que entrarán en el bombo de los números.
Esta operación se efectúa tanto con las bolas de números como con las de premios. Por último, los bombos son cerrados y a una señal del presidente se voltean simultáneamente. Un niño o niña del colegio de San Ildefonso extrae una bola del bombo de números y otro niño, a la vez, otra del de premios, con lo que comienza el sorteo, en torno a las nueve de la mañana.
Al finalizar el sorteo de Navidad, cuando en el bombo de premios no queda ninguna bola, un equipo de más de cuarenta personas se encarga de realizar la lista de premios del sorteo y de las poblaciones agraciadas con los premios mediante un proceso informático controlado en todos sus extremos.
De esta forma, aproximadamente a los 45 minutos de terminado el sorteo, y después de haber pasado por varias comprobaciones y punteos, está preparada la cinta y lista de premios para su entrega a la Fábrica Nacional de Moneda y Timbre, encargada de imprimir la lista oficial de premios. Dicha lista se edita y distribuye la misma tarde del día del sorteo a las Administraciones de Loterías y a los medios de comunicación.
Las tablas de los números premiados, quedan expuestas siete días al público. Transcurrido este tiempo son abiertas y las bolas contadas y examinadas nuevamente, para cualquier otro sorteo posterior a celebrar por este sistema.

description.hltext_display: Hold dear the memories, meals with loved ones
description.content: Thanksgiving had come and gone, along with all the feasting and family that holiday invites. A column I wrote on my first personal crack at my Mom's long-beloved rolls was really more about love and loss than flour and yeast. It struck a chord with Denise Mason White of Union and her e-mail to me spoke to the heart of the holiday season. Treasure your time with loved ones. Good meals and good memories help the healing. So, keep the kitchen flame alive this Christmas and if you can, spend some quality time at the stove with a loved one. Here is Denise's story: "For years, Mom and I laughed about her efforts to teach me how to make her gravy, biscuits and that melt-in-your mouth roast. It became a 'running' joke that every time she would start telling me how to make one of the three (especially the biscuits), I would 'run' out the door; my philosophy being that if I never gave her the chance to teach me, in the event of a catastrophic illness, she would suddenly snap out of a coma once she remembered 'But I haven't taught Necie how to make my biscuits!' The whole family laughed about this for years. "She had four children - my sister in Louisiana who learned her cooking from her mother-in-law, so didn't need Mom around to teach her, along with my two eternal bachelor brothers, both in their 50s, who think as long as they can cook a piece of meat over fire and make decent coffee, they are set. I, on the other hand, am the youngest of the four, and lived right next door to Mom. "Through breast cancer and more than a couple hospitalizations for low blood sugar, we realized Alzheimer's was taking her from us slowly, cruelly, and the desire to cook went out the door with her appetite. "Trying to get her in the kitchen to teach me became a mission, and I was the Commander of the Challenger. I never could get her past the launch before she would get angry (over something perceived, not real), and go sulk in her room like a petulant teenager. "In March, a stroke took her from me ... for the last time. "I've had several months to be sad, angry, depressed, in denial, and finally accept her passing. Granted, in reality, she had been gone from us mentally for over a year. "My new husband has a wonderful mother who also has a debilitating disease that is robbing her of her ability to do the things we take for granted. My husband LIVES for her 'stuffing' as he calls it, even though it never sees the inside of a turkey. In a recent visit to their Harrison County home, she sat me down and gave me the magic recipe - from memory, of course. A pinch of this, a little that, and I had the magic recipe. "For the first time in my life (just past 41), my cornbread turned out perfect. I looked to the heavens and thanked Mom for her help in that. The rest went as easily, and two days after Thanksgiving, we travelled South again for the taste test. I waited with bated breath as my mother in law took a bite... hmm, good texture, not soggy, not dry. Another bite ... and another. With a smile of her face, she said, 'OK, I can go now, I finally got a daughter that can cook my dressing!' We fussed at her for making such a mean joke, but she knew what I had been through in the years preceding with my own mother. "Thanksgiving morning, I walked next door to mother's house, which has barely been touched, on a mission. I went straight to the pantry and took out every cookbook I could find. I was heartbroken a few years ago to find out she had thrown out her Amy Vanderbilt cookbook because the pages were sticking together. That was probably the first sign of Alzheimer's. At any rate, I went online, and was able to find her favorite recipe, Mildred Langrock's Chicken Fricassee. It is incredible. "I had printed a copy and given it to Mom a while back, thinking she would probably just throw it away. Nope, it was stuck in the middle of her 40-year-old copy of Better Homes and Gardens Cookbook. "It was also the last thing she cooked for all of us last year at Christmas." Contact staff writer Sherry Lucas at (601) 961-7283 or e-mail slucas@ clarionledger.com.

description.hltext_display: 沃尔玛控股好又多延至明年5月 恐陷两败
description.content:
本想通过并购实现在中国市场的一跃而上，但现在却只能默默吞下苦果。全球最大零售商沃尔玛收购好又多一事最近又再起波澜，公司最新声明表示，"沃尔玛和出售方股东达成一致将好又多的交易延期至2011年5月26日，以满足合同中的某些交易条件"。
尽管沃尔玛对某些交易条件的所指不愿多提，但其收购过程中的种种纠结早已成公开的秘密。
拖：控股再度延期
此次收购案已经一再拖延。2007年2月，沃尔玛以2.64亿美元的价格购买广州好又多控股公司BCL35%的股权，同时向其他股东提供3.76亿美元贷款，换取了另外30%投票权。为此，沃尔玛虽然只持有好又多35%的股权，却拥有65%投票权，从而全面掌控好又多的经营。据协议，沃尔玛有权在2010年进一步扩大股权比例，从而成为好又多的控股股东。
进入"后收购"时代，但沃尔玛对好又多的改造却迟迟未能开展起来，直到去年初才迟缓推进。根据原来的计划，沃尔玛今年2月会全面控股好又多，但是到最后冲刺阶段时又推迟到了今年11月26日。而现在控股计划又宣告推迟至2011年5月26日。
不过，所幸在今年11月1日前，沃尔玛对好又多漫长的升级改造也告一段落。昨日，沃尔玛相关负责人告诉记者，广州全部17家好又多门店已经全部改造完毕，不过，现在采购还存在两套体系，"包括沃尔玛的统采，广州好又多的采购站也还存在。"
乱：整合麻烦不断
"沃尔玛对好又多的整合过程之所以步履迟缓可以说主要有两大原因，一个是收购过程在政策层面手尾太多，另一个则是从双方文化到管理运营理念，两个企业都存在激烈的冲突。"广州楚睿商业咨询公司董事长黄文杰告诉记者，在宣布收购后的半年多时间里，好又多对沃尔玛采取不接受不认同的方式。直到2008年上半年，沃尔玛对好又多中层以上管理员工进行了"大换血"，好又多近18名台籍干部未被续聘。而沃尔玛的营运高管孟永明、张韧相继离职。
现在文化冲突已经大有改观吗？上述沃尔玛的负责人表示，两套班子的人马都已经在一起共事，现在处于经营中相互借鉴阶段。不过，有曾任职于沃尔玛的员工则透露，沃尔玛的管理风格正如采购系统一样，都是"中央集权制"，所有决定都必须遵照规定走程序。整合之后，门店管理人员的权力被稀释，连一次谈判的时间、地点都不能自己决定。
此外，据了解，好又多门店内资转成外资、产权问题、采购系统的整合等等也一直是整合之路上的绊脚石。尽管现在好又多104家门店的身份已经变成外资，但手尾似乎还是源源不断。有媒体称，此次拖延的原因可能是因为现在尚有30多家好又多门店存在不是商业用地、没有房产证等涉嫌违规问题待解决。
怒：员工趁机作乱
事实上，在沃尔玛"去好又多化"的漫长过程中，不少好又多的员工也人人自危，从而滋生了趁机作乱的现象。一位好又多的供应商向记者透露，"在收购大限的前半年时间里，因为整合会涉及到裁员，好又多的采购人员都在做最后的疯狂。"
这位经销商还直言，尽管现在进卖场都要被"扒掉一层皮"，但是经过沃尔玛和好又多的整合，沃尔玛已经成为最"流氓"的零售商了。好又多升级改造后，所有的费用都要重新来过，甚至更为苛刻，还要强制性收取5%的物流费用。
有业内专家也表示，其实在收购计划的实施过程中，沃尔玛不但没有发挥出双方合力规模化、多网络的效应，好又多也毫无心情顾及到与对手的竞争，在扩张路上毫无建树的同时，业绩也出现下滑。现在，似乎已经陷入了一个两败俱伤的局面。

description.hltext_display: CNPV wird wichtigster chinesischer Zulieferer von Donauer Solartechnik
description.content: (ots/PRNewswire) -- CNPV Solar Power SA, eine öffentliche, nach luxemburgischem Recht gegründete Kapitalgesellschaft und ein führender integrierter Hersteller von Photovoltaikprodukten, gab heute den Abschluss eines langfristigen Partnerschaftsabkommens mit der Donauer Solartechnik Vertriebs GmbH bekannt. Donauer, ein Unternehmen mit über 15 Jahren Erfahrung auf dem Sektor der erneuerbaren Energien, entwickelt Projekte und vertreibt Produkte im Bereich von Photovoltaik und Solarthermie.

description.hltext_display: Los datos de la violencia machista enciende las alarmas
description.content: Un total de 72 muertas en lo va de año y 3 casos en investigación. Los datos de la violencia machista han encendido todas las alarmas, tanto que la minista Leire Pajin ha convocado una reunión de urgencia en el Congreso. Este año han sido asesinadas 16 mujeres mas que en todo 2009. La ministra reconoce que la ley es mejorable pero ha destacado la importancia de que el delito no quede impune. La reunión ha finalizado con el compromiso de intensificar las medidas de proteccion y hacerlas más generalizadas. Actualmente hay 32000 mujeres protegidas pero solo 400 maltratadores llevan instalada una pulsera. El gobierno quiere que sean más.

UCLA: Lee helps Bruins win 4th straight
description.content:
LOS ANGELES - Former Riverside North standout Malcolm Lee scored 16 points and Reeves Nelson had 15 as UCLA beat Montana State, 75-59, Tuesday night at Pauley Pavilion.
Joshua Smith had nine points and nine rebounds, and Tyler Honeycutt added nine points for the Bruins (7-4), who used a 22-4 run to pull away for their fourth win in a row.
UCLA was efficient in shooting 48.1 percent (26 of 54) while turning the ball over just 10 times. Montana State shot 34 percent.
The Bruins saw a 15-point lead disappear and trailed by three points early in the second half before turning up the speed for an array of fast-break baskets.
Erik Rush scored 13 points and Tre Johnson added 12 for Montana State (6-6), which dropped to 0-6 in road games. The Bobcats lost to UC Riverside, 78-67, on Sunday.
The Bobcats opened the second half with a 10-2 spurt to grab their first lead. UCLA later responded with 12 straight points, with six coming from Honeycutt, for the 55-46 advantage.

event_or_fact.property: 12 for Montana State (6-6), which dropped to 0-6 in road games

description.hltext_display: US poised to approve nuclear arms pact with Russia
description.content:
The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.

event_or_fact.property: We know when we've been beaten
We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons

description.hltext_display: 紫金矿业溃坝处理：15人送法办4厅座追
description.content:
昨日上午，广东省纪委通报"9·21"信宜紫金矿业有限公司银岩锡矿高旗岭尾矿库溃坝、造成重大人员伤亡和财产损失的调查处理情况。据悉，共有36人因此受处理，信宜市安监局长庄达耀、信宜市国土局局长温平生及紫金公司总经理等15人被移送司法机关，同时有21名政府及监管部门人员被追究纪律责任，其中有厅级干部4人、处级干部8人。
也是在昨日，信宜市法院在该市钱排镇设立便民办案点，溃坝事件中死亡人员的家属现场提起民事诉讼。据悉，溃坝事件共造成22人死亡，当天该院共受理死亡人员家属提起的人身损害赔偿案20宗，索赔标的金额1100多万元。
据悉，因溃坝事件此前信宜市政府已就此向紫金矿业起诉，向其索赔1950万元。昨日，广东省监察厅副厅长曾庆荣在通报后表示，将责成当地政府依法依规继续向紫金矿业提出索赔，切实维护灾区人民群众的合法权益。
36人被处理
●机关工作人员4人庄达耀，信宜市安全监管局局长。任职期间，收受信宜紫金公司钱财，履职不到位。
温平生，信宜市国土资源局局长，原钱排镇镇委书记、镇长，收受信宜紫金公司钱财。
李平，钱排镇镇委书记、原镇长，收受信宜紫金公司钱财。
叶瑞昌，信宜市国土资源局主任科员、原局长。担任局长期间，收受信宜紫金公司钱财，存在违法批地、监管不力、瞒报企业违法用地行为等问题。
以上人还涉及其它严重违法违纪问题，均已移送司法机关处理，并将给予开除党籍、开除公职处分。
共 2 页 [1][2]下一页末页

description.hltext_display: 刘翔月末将再度赴美国检查 翔之队：不能满足现状
description.content:
来源：中国山东网 www.sdchina.com 发布时间：2010-12-22 11:27:57
来源：中国山东网 www.sdchina.com 发布时间：2010-12-22 11:27:57
刘翔将再度赴美（资料图）
体坛网讯 北京时间12月21日消息，本月末，飞人刘翔将再次飞赴美国，进行身体检查和康复训练。
刘翔这次是受可口可乐公司之邀，赴洛杉矶参加一个活动，不过翔之队“醉翁之意不在酒”，主要是想借这次机会再次到美国进行一次复查，并修正一下康复计划。
“这段时间训练下来，刘翔的情况很好，但是我们不能仅仅满足现状。”翔之队有关人士透露，“要想让刘翔有更大的发展，在明后年的大赛中，更具有竞争性，务必还需要尽可能减少脚伤对他训练和比赛的影响，所以我们决定再次前往美国进行康复、训练。”
目前刘翔本人正在海南放松，月底将赴美国，他的这次美国之行时间不会很长，大约在明年1月中旬就会回到上海，继续冬训。

description.hltext_display: Sky Sports: Уволниха Бенитес от Интер
description.content:
Рафа Бенитес вече не е треньор на Интер, съобщава „Sky Sports”. Испанецът е бил уволнен след само шест месеца, начело на „нерадзурите”.
Бенитес бе назначен през лятото, но не успя да продължи започнатото от Жозе Моуриньо, който спечели требъл през миналия сезон.
Под ръководството на бившия мениджър на Ливърпул, Интер стигна до седмото място в Серия А, на цели 13 точки зад лидера Милан. В Шампионската лига отборът също бе колеблив, като завърши втори в своята група и на 1/8-финалите ще трябва да играе срещу Байерн.
Въпреки че успя да спечели Световното клубно първенство, Бенитес тотално изчерпа търпението на президента Масимо Морати с призива да получи подкрепа на трансферния пазар, за да остане начело на отбора.
Все още новината не е съобщена официално.

description.hltext_display: Emery: "Les hemos hecho sufrir, pero nos ha faltado marcar"
description.content: El entrenador del Valencia, Unai Emery, lamentó tras el empate a cero en el partido de ida de los octavos de Copa del Rey ante el Villarreal, que su equipo no pudiera marcar un gol realizar un partido completo."Les hemos hecho sufrir y hemos llevado el partido a nuestro terreno, pero no hemos ganado", aseguró el técnico del Valencia.Por su parte, el técnico del Villarreal, Juan Carlos Garrido, admitió que en el primer periodo el Valencia fue superior. "Su fútbol directo nos creó problemas y nosotros estuvimos muy imprecisos. Nuestros desaciertos y los merecimientos del rival condicionaron el encuentro", añadió.

description.hltext_display: EU decomisa arsenal que venía a México
description.content:
La Embajada de Estados Unidos en México dio a conocer que oficiales de la Agencia de Aduanas y Protección Fronteriza (CBP), al realizar un operativo contra el tráfico de drogas y armas, lograron detectar el arsenal.
Los oficiales de la CBP encontraron una camioneta GMC Sierra, modelo 2000, color bronce, que intentaba salir de Estados Unidos hacia México. El conductor, identificado como un ciudadano mexicano de 45 años que reside en McAllen, Texas, fue conducido a un área de inspección secundaria para ser revisado.
En la inspección se lograron incautar 20 rifles calibre .22, una escopeta calibre 20, tres escopetas calibre 12, una pistola semiautomática calibre .380, un revolver calibre .357, cuatro cartuchos de alta capacidad y cuatro mil 448 municiones escondidas dentro del vehículo, por lo que se procedió a la detención del presunto traficante.
El inculpado fue entregado a agentes especiales de la División de Investigaciones de Seguridad de la Agencia de Inmigración y Aduanas (ICE HSI) para continuar con las investigaciones.
"Este es el primer decomiso significativo en el puente internacional Donna-Río Bravo y los agentes de la CBP continuarán trabajando diligentemente para detener el flujo de armas hacia México y el de narcóticos hacia los Estados Unidos. Felicito a los agentes de la CBP por una sobresaliente labor en esta intercepción", señaló la directora del Puerto de Entrada Nancy Becker.

description.hltext_display: Divided FCC adopts rules to protect Web traffic
description.content:
(WASHINGTON) -- Federal regulators adopted new rules Tuesday to keep the companies that control the Internet's pipelines from restricting what their customers do online or blocking competing services, including online calling applications and Web video.
The vote by the Federal Communications Commission was 3-2 and quickly came under attack from the commission's two Republicans, who said the rules would discourage investments in broadband. Prominent Republicans in Congress vowed to work to overturn them.
Meanwhile, critics at the other end of the political spectrum were disappointed that the new regulations don't do enough to safeguard the fastest-growing way that people access the Internet today -- through wireless devices like smart phones and tablets.
The new rules have the backing of the White House and capped a year of efforts by FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski to find a compromise. They are intended to ensure that broadband providers cannot use their control of the Internet's on-ramps to dictate where their subscribers can go.
They will prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services that travel over their networks -- including online calling services such as Skype, Internet video services such as Netflix and other applications that compete with their core businesses.
The prohibitions, known as "net neutrality," have been at the center of a Washington policy dispute for at least five years. The issue hit home with many Internet users in 2007, when Comcast Corp. slowed traffic from an Internet file-sharing service called BitTorrent. The cable giant argued that the service, which was used to trade movies and other big files over the Internet, was clogging its network.
The new FCC rules are intended to prevent that type of behavior.
They require broadband providers to let subscribers access all legal online content, applications and services over their wired networks. They do give providers flexibility to manage data on their systems to deal with network congestion and unwanted traffic, including spam, as long as they publicly disclose how they manage the network.
"Today, for the first time, we are adopting rules to preserve basic Internet values," Genachowski said. "For the first time, we'll have enforceable rules of the road to preserve Internet freedom and openness."
On one level, the new rules probably won't mean big changes for Internet users. After Comcast's actions cast a spotlight on the issue -- and drew a rebuke from the FCC -- all of the major broadband providers have already pledged not to discriminate against Internet traffic on their wired networks.
Even Genachowski acknowledged Tuesday that a key goal of the new rules is to preserve the open Internet as it exists today.
Still, critics say the rules don't do enough to break the existing lock-hold that wireless carriers have over the online applications that subscribers can access through their systems.
The regulations prohibit wireless carriers from blocking access to any websites or competing services such as Internet calling applications on mobile devices, and they require carriers to disclose their network management practices, too. But wireless companies get more leeway to manage data traffic because wireless systems have less network bandwidth and can become overwhelmed with traffic more easily than wired lines.
That means that while wireless carriers must allow access to Internet calling services such as Skype, they could potentially still block online video applications, such as Sling.
The rules also wouldn't apply to phone makers, so Apple could still dictate which applications to accept or reject for the iPhone. Apple could choose to block Skype, for instance, even if AT&T, which provides wireless service for the iPhone, can't.
At a time when more and more people go online using smart phones and other mobile devices instead of computers, the rules leave wireless carriers with tremendous control over tomorrow's Internet, said Gigi Sohn, president of the public interest group Public Knowledge.
At the same time, Sen. Al Franken, D-Minn., fears the rules don't do enough to ensure that broadband providers cannot favor their own traffic or the traffic of business partners that can pay extra. Big websites such as Google Inc., for instance, could pay to have their content download more quickly than mom-and-pop sites -- leading to what critics term a two-tiered Internet.
While the new rules prohibit unreasonable network discrimination -- a category that FCC officials say would most likely include such "paid prioritization" -- they do not explicitly bar the practice. What's more, they leave the door open for broadband providers to experiment with routing traffic from specialized services, such as home security systems, over dedicated networks as long as they're kept separate from the public Internet.
These concerns resonated with Genachowski's two Democratic colleagues at the FCC, who voted to approve the rules only reluctantly.
"Today's action could -- and should -- have gone further," said Michael Copps, one of the other two Democrats on the commission. But, he added, the regulations do represent some progress "to put consumers -- not Big Phone or Big Cable -- in control of their online experiences."
Republicans, meanwhile, said they worry the rules will discourage phone and cable companies from upgrading their networks because it will be more difficult for them to earn a healthy return on their investments. Republicans also said the regulations seek to fix a problem that doesn't exist because broadband providers have already pledged not to discriminate.
"The Internet will be no more open tomorrow than it is today," said Meredith Attwell Baker, one of the two FCC Republicans, in voting against the rules.
A number of prominent Republicans -- including Kay Bailey Hutchison of Texas, the top Republican on the Senate Commerce Committee, and Fred Upton of Michigan, the incoming chairman of the House Commerce Committee -- vowed to try to overturn the rules.
Robert McDowell, the FCC's other Republican, predicted that the FCC will face court challenges to its regulatory authority as well.
In April, a federal appeals court ruled that the agency had exceeded its existing authority in sanctioning Comcast for discriminating against online file-sharing traffic on its network -- violating broad net neutrality principles first established by the FCC in 2005.
Those principles serve as a foundation for the formal rules adopted Tuesday.

description.hltext_display: Nur wenige Hochtief-Aktionäre greifen zu
description.content:
Die Offerte ist inzwischen zwar deutlich besser, aber dennoch hat ACS schlechte Karten: Der spanische Infrastrukturkonzern ACS kommt auch mit seinem verbesserten Übernahmeangebot bei den Aktionären von Hochtief nur langsam voran. Nur wenige Hochtief-Eigner ändern etwas an ihrem "nein". Quelle: dapd
HB DÜSSELDORF. Bis zum Dienstagabend sei das Tauschangebot für 5825 Hochtief-Aktien angenommen worden, teilte ACS am Mittwoch im Internet mit. Der Anteil der Stimmrechte an Hochtief liege damit bei 27,26 Prozent.
Damit würde ACS auch inklusive der vom Finanzinvestor Southeastern Asset Management in Ausssicht gestellten „ungefähr“ zwei Millionen Aktien noch unter der Schwelle von 30 Prozent liegen. „Unser Angebot und unsere Strategie bleiben unverändert“, sagte eine ACS-Sprecherin in Deutschland. description.hltext_display: Hammers close in on Sidwell
description.content:
West Ham are closing in on the signing of Aston Villa midfielder Steve Sidwell, Press Association Sport understands.
The Hammers are desperate to add to their ranks as they look to climb off the foot of the Barclays Premier League table.
Sidwell, who has made just three starts for Villa this season due to an Achilles injury, is understood to be in negotiations with the Hammers over a move to the capital, although reports that the former Chelsea man has undergone a medical at the club are thought to be wide of the mark.
The 28-year-old is out of contract at the end of the season and is thought to be keen on a move to his home city, having grown up in Wandsworth which is around 10 miles away from Upton Park.
Sidwell would give the Hammers more options in midfield where the team have struggled after losing Mark Noble and Thomas Hitzlsperger to injury.
The move would reunite Sidwell with Hammers boss Avram Grant, who managed the midfielder during an ill-fated stint at Stamford Bridge which saw him make 10 starts in a year-long spell following a move from Reading, where he played a key part in the Royals promotion to the Barclays Premier League.
Grant is under pressure having seen his side pick up just two wins so far this campaign to leave the East London outfit rooted to the foot of the table as the season reaches the halfway stage.
The Israeli recently said that he was looking to add up to three new players to his squad during the transfer window and has also been linked with a move for Newcastle midfielder Joey Barton.

description.hltext_display: Berliner Klinik: Pfleger gibt zu, Kinder sexuell missbraucht zu haben
description.content:
Ein Krankenpfleger soll in einem Berliner Krankenhaus Kinder sexuell missbraucht und davon Filmaufnahmen gemacht haben. Die Staatsanwaltschaft ermittelt gegen den 27-Jährigen wegen schweren sexuellen Missbrauchs in drei Fällen, wie ein Behördensprecher sagte. Er bestätigte damit Informationen der Berliner Morgenpost“
Der Pfleger, der auf einer Kinderintensivstation im Helios-Klinikum im Stadtteil Buch arbeitete, auf der sei am Freitag verhaftet worden. Zuvor hatte ein betroffener Junge seinen Eltern von den Taten erzählt. Die "Bild"-Zeitung berichtet, dass er durch Medikamente ruhiggestellt gewesen war und wie schlafend wirkte, die Übergriffe aber bei vollem Bewusstsein miterlebte. Zwei Mal soll der Pfleger ihn missbraucht haben.
In Untersuchungshaft hat der Mann versucht, sich das Leben zu nehmen. Er soll sich selbst kastriert haben, berichtet die "Bild"-Zeitung weiter. Der 27-Jährige ist nun in medizinischer Behandlung. In einem Verhör soll er die Vorwürfe eingeräumt haben.
Die Anklagebehörde wirft ihm vor, in dem Krankenhaus neben dem Neunjährigen auch einen weiteren Jungen missbraucht zu haben, der sich nicht wehren konnte. Auch diese Kinder sollen mit Medikamenten ruhig gestellt gewesen sein, weil sie so große Schmerzen hatten. Auf der Intensivstation kämpfen die Kinder unter anderem gegen Krebs. Nach der Festnahme fanden die Ermittler Handy-Aufnahmen der Taten. Die Staatsanwaltschaft hält weitere Fälle für möglich. Wir sind entsetzt und fassungslos“, teilte das Klinikum mit. Wir bedauern zutiefst das Leid, aber auch die Ungewissheit, die jetzt viele Eltern und Patienten quält, selbst wenn sie nicht betroffen sind oder waren.“
Der 27-Jährige hat sich nach Angaben einer Sprecherin bislang nichts zuschulden kommen lassen. Er arbeitete seit Oktober 2009 auf der Station. Einem Bericht der Berliner Morgenpost"
Der Mann war auf der Station für das Füttern von Kleinkindern sowie das Verabreichen von Medikamenten verantwortlich gewesen. Der Regionalgeschäftsführer der Klinik, Armin Engel, sagte der Berliner Morgenpost"
Auch die Vergangenheit des 27-Jährigen scheint makellos: Der Mann habe drei Brüder, darunter einen Zwilling. Auch in einem Internetportal wirkte er völlig normal, wie die Berliner Morgenpost" Der Missbrauch von Kindern, die uns anvertraut sind, die unseren besonderen Schutz brauchen, macht uns sehr betroffen und mich persönlich auch wütend“, zitiert das Blatt den Ärztlichen Direktor des Klinikums in Buch, Josef Zacher. Wie ausgerechnet auf der Intensivstation des Hauses zu solchen Verbrechen kommen konnte, einem Bereich mit offenen Türen und viel Personal, sei momentan noch nicht vorstellbar.
Auf dieser Intensivstation seien Patienten im Alter zwischen einem und 16 Jahren untergebracht. Die elf Betten stehen in vier Doppel- und einem Dreibettzimmern. Rund um die Uhr seien in Schichten zehn Mitarbeiter, darunter Pfleger und Ärzte, im Dienst, hieß es. Die Zimmer liegen zudem noch Wand an Wand und natürlich seien auf der Station auch noch die Schwesternräume untergebracht.
In seinem Abschiedbrief an die Familie soll der Mann laut "B.Z." geschrieben haben, dass es für ihn keine gerechte Strafe gebe. Er schäme sich und habe Angst vor zu Hause, nachdem sein Geheimnis gelüftet sei, schreibt die Zeitung. Er hoffe zudem, dass seine Familie ihn jetzt nicht als Monster sehe.
Alle Eltern, deren Söhne in den vergangenen 14 Monaten Patienten der Kinderintensivstation waren, seien am Mittwoch in einem Brief über die Ermittlungen informiert worden. Eltern können sich telefonisch unter 030/94 015 44 44 an das Klinikum wenden (8 bis 20 Uhr) . Das Klinikum bietet auch psychologische Betreuung an.dpa/kamiEin 27-jähriger Krankenpfleger hat den Missbrauch von Kindern gestanden. Der Mann soll sich an Jungen auf der Intensivstation vergangen haben.

description.hltext_display: 少年野球：ベンチ入りを目指す ２１番目の選手、原北ウイングス・乙藤祐樹君
丰田� 召回问题支付美政府3420万美元罚款
description.content:
据日本产经新闻12月21号报道：美国运输部于20日宣称，关于丰田因油门踏板存在安全隐患而实行大规模召回这一事件，决定追加制裁金3242.5万美元。
丰田早已知晓油门脚踏板复位存在问题，却迟迟未知会美方当局，因此已于今年四月支付制裁金1637.5万美元。加上此次追加制裁金，总计高达4880万美元。
此次追加制裁金的具体内容涉及两个方面，分别是油门脚踏板复位问题1637.5万美元，以及方向盘零件存在安全隐患无法操纵1605万美元。因其知情不报，美当局对丰田处以法律上最高制裁金。

description.hltext_display: Le rhinocéros menacé d'extinction
description.content: Protéger les rhinocéros, une espèce menacée d'extinction, s'annonce difficile aussi bien en Afrique qu'en Asie où le marché noir pour les cornes de ces mammifères est en pleine expansion, facilité par l'utilisation de moyens très sophistiqués par les braconniers. L'épicentre du massacre a lieu en Afrique du Sud qui concentre plus de 70% de la population mondiale de rhinocéros. En 2010, 316 animaux ont été braconnés contre 122 l'année dernière et moins de 10 il y a deux décennies, selon le Fonds mondial pour la nature (WWF). "Cette année a été désastreuse pour la protection des rhinos", se désole Joseph Okori, coordinateur chargé des rhinocéros africains au sein du WWF. "Les organisations criminelles en Afrique du Sud opèrent avec une technologie très avancée. Elles sont très bien coordonnées. Ce n'est pas le braconnage habituel", souligne-t-il. Hélicoptères, armes silencieuses, lunettes à infrarouge et tranquillisants tendent à remplacer fusils ou simples lances des chasseurs locaux. Il ne reste plus que 25.000 rhinocéros dans le monde dont trois espèces en Asie et deux en Afrique de l'Est et australe, selon l'Union internationale pour la conservation de la nature (UICN). Quatre d'entre elles sont aujourd'hui menacées d'extinction, précise la Convention sur le commerce international des espèces de faune et de flore sauvages menacées d'extinction (CITES). Face à l'ampleur du phénomène, les parcs nationaux sud-africains ont pris des mesures drastiques en créant en octobre une "unité de combat contre le braconnage des rhinocéros". D'autres choisissent de couper les cornes comme au Zimbabwe voisin, d'installer des puces électroniques, de renforcer les patrouilles ou d'infiltrer des réseaux criminels. "Il y a une demande illimitée et si on ne s'attaque pas à la source, cela va se déplacer dans d'autres pays comme on l'a déjà vu auparavant", prévient M. Milliken. . .

description.hltext_display: El Gordo ha tocado en siete ocasiones en Baleares
description.author: Diario de Ibiza
description.content:
Cada habitante juega 39,76 euros, siendo la comunidad que menos ha gastado
VOTE ESTA NOTICIA
PALMA DE MALLORCA | EUROPA PRESS Los ciudadanos de Baleares aspiran este miércoles a superar en el Sorteo Extraordinario de la Lotería de Navidad los 4,65 millones de euros que tocaron el año pasado en Mallorca, tras venderse un quinto premio en la Administración número 15 de Palma y la Administración número 2 de Marratxí y otro quinto premio en las Administraciones número 2 y 36 de la capital balear.
Así, el pasado año la gran afortunada fue la Administración de Lotería número 15 de Palma, ubicada en la calle Francisco Barceló y Combis, que repartió 4,5 millones de euros tras vender 900 décimos (90 series), de los cuales cerca de 2 millones fueron a parar al Club de Vela del Puerto de Andratx, después de que una trabajadora comprara entre 25 y 30 series, que las repartió entre sus compañeros.
Entre los afortunados, se encontraba el ex-alcalde de Andratx, Eugenio Hidalgo, quien se encuentra en la cárcel, y su hermano, Carlos Hidalgo, quienes compraron varios décimos en esta Administración, donde ambos compran lotería desde hace muchos años.
De esta forma, el año pasado fue mucho más afortunado que el 2008, cuando únicamente tocó un 'pellizco' de 50.000 euros en Mallorca, tras venderse una serie de uno de los ocho quintos premios en la Administración número 7 de Palma, ubicada en la Avenida Argentina número 10.
Pese a que Baleares ha sido agraciada en siete ocasiones con el Gordo, la última en 2003 en Capdepera, vuelve a ser este año la Comunidad en la que menos dinero se juega en el Sorteo de Navidad, con 39,76 euros por habitante, con datos a fecha de 25 de octubre, lo que supone dos euros menos que en 2009, cuando cada ciudadano gastó 41,89 euros, según datos de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado, que revelan que la media nacional se sitúa en 68,68 euros.
Cinco veces en Palma
Concretamente, el Gordo ha tocado en Palma en cinco ocasiones (1843, 1872, 1886, 1902 y 1995), mientras que los municipios mallorquines de Capdepera y Santa Maria del Camí resultaron agraciados con el primer premio del Sorteo de Navidad en 2003 y 1986, respectivamente.
Con datos de consignación a fecha de 25 de octubre, las islas jugarán 43,5 millones de euros, tras consignarse 217.749 billetes.
Respecto a la compra de Lotería de Navidad, La Rioja está a la cabeza, con una consignación de 101,24 euros, seguida de Castilla y León (97,74 euros), Asturias (91,73 euros), Aragón (85,78 euros), Madrid (82,58 euros), País Vasco (81,65 euros), Comunidad Valenciana (78,32 euros), Cantabria (72,46 euros) y Castilla la Mancha (72,34 euros).
Mientras, los que menos van a gastarse este año son los habitantes de Baleares (39,76 euros), Canarias (41,70 euros), Andalucía (47,35 euros), Extremadura (55,08 euros), Navarra (56,66 euros), Galicia (66,75 euros), Cataluña (67,23 euros) y Murcia (71,05 euros).
3.315 millones a repartir
El Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad repartirá este miércoles 2.320,5 millones de euros en premios. Como cada año, los niños de San Ildefonso extraerán de los dos bombos, durante alrededor de tres horas y media, los números y los premios y los cantarán ante la atenta mirada del público.
Como principal novedad de este año, destaca que el sorteo ya no se llevará a cabo en el salón de Loterías de la calle Guzmán el Bueno, tal como ha sucedido durante más de 40 años, sino en el Palacio de Congresos y Exposiciones de Madrid, ubicado en el Paseo de la Castellana.
El nuevo edificio tiene capacidad para 2.000 personas, mientras que el anterior sólo podía albergar a 500, si bien quienes no acudan a verlo 'in situ', podrán seguirlo en Baleares en directo, a partir de las 09.00 horas por TVE e IB3 Televisión.
Otra de las novedades consiste en que este año, los participantes del sorteo con números premiados con más de 3.000 euros (conocidos como los 'premios grandes') podrán cobrarlos al día siguiente por primera vez desde la celebración de este evento. Hasta ahora, estos 'premios grandes' únicamente podían cobrarse nueve días después de la celebración del sorteo.
Al igual que el pasado año, hay 195 series, que constan a su vez de 85.000 billetes. De la emisión total de 3.315 millones de euros, se destina a premios el 70 por ciento (2.320,5 millones) quedando el 30 por ciento restante para el pago de comisiones a los puntos de venta, gastos de administración y tesoro público.
El ansiado Gordo está dotado con 3 millones de euros por serie, lo que supone 300.000 euros en cada décimo, de forma que el número premiado repartirá 540 millones de euros. Por su parte, el segundo premio está dotado con 1 millón de euros a la serie y el tercero con 500.000 euros.
Además, habrá dos cuartos premios de 200.000 euros cada uno y ocho quintos premios de 50.000 euros cada uno. En total, se repartirán 26 millones de premios, eso sí, con cantidades que en muchos casos apenas recompensarán los 68 euros de media que se gastará cada ciudadano español.
Como en años anteriores, cada décimo ha costado 20 euros y en esta ocasión, está ilustrado con una imagen navideña del siglo XV, titulada 'Navidad' Adoración de los Pastores y se trata de una obra de la Escuela flamenca, perteneciente al retablo de San Juan Bautista en la Parroquia del Santísimo Salvador de Valladolid.
El precio de un número completo es de 39.000 euros y el de cada billete de 200 euros, dividido en décimos de 20 euros. En total, habrá 26.001.300 décimos premiados de entre los 85.000 números que se meterán en el bombo.
Historia del sorteo
Los orígenes del Sorteo de Navidad se sitúan en el celebrado el día 18 de diciembre de 1812, más por el entusiasmo, sentir popular y proximidad a esas fechas que por la denominación en sí mismo, ya que el título como tal, 'Sorteo de Navidad', no llegó hasta 1892. En aquel primer sorteo, el precio del billete fue de 40 reales y el 'Gordo' estaba dotado de 8.000 pesos fuertes. Se realiza por el sistema tradicional, un bombo para números y otro para premios y tiene una duración aproximada de tres horas y media.
De los De los 199 Sorteos de Navidad celebrados, el primer premio conocido popularmente como 'El Gordo', ha correspondido en sesenta y dos ocasiones a un número comprendido entre el 0 y el 10.000; en setenta y dos ocasiones a un número entre el 10.001 y el 30.000 y en sesenta y seis ocasiones a números comprendidos entre el 30.001 y el 85.000.
Como cifra final, el 5 ha sido el número que más veces resultó premiado, concretamente, en 32 ocasiones, seguido del 4, con 27 veces; el 6 con 26 apariciones y el 3 y el 8, ambos con 20. Por el contrario, la cifra final menos repetida ha sido el 1, que sólo ha aparecido en ocho ocasiones, seguido del 2 y el 9.

description.hltext_display: Villar: "El año 2010 pasará a la historia como el mejor del fútbol español"
description.content: El presidente de la Real Federación Española de Fútbol, Ángel María Villar, aseguró ayer en su discurso durante la cena de Navidad con la prensa, que "el año 2010 pasará a la historia como el mejor año del fútbol español". "El año 2010, después de 101 años de historia de la RFEF, pasará a la historia de esta institución como el mejor año del fútbol español. Se han dado muchos acontecimientos destacados, aunque el que más ha sido el Campeonato del Mundo, ganado por todos los que estuvieron allí dentro de la Selección. Todos somos necesarios, nadie imprescindible", señaló. "Ha habido muchos calificativos y todos destacan valores de nuestra selección como trabajo, constancia, saber estar y sobre todo la humildad. Hemos sido los mejores jugando y los mejores también fuera del campo", añadió.

description.content: Berlin (dpa) - Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. Man habe mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrührten, sagte der CSU- Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden....

description.hltext_display: 羽联提高奖金反遭李永波斥责：太随意 不� 谱
description.content:
来源：中国山东网 www.sdchina.com 发布时间：2010-12-22 11:27:57
世界羽联宣布大幅提高超级系列赛奖金，看似有益于羽毛球发展，但中国羽毛球队总教练李永波昨天现身羊城，直斥此举“不靠谱”。
在超级系列赛中，韩国站奖金高达120万美元，是超级赛原最高奖金的4倍；印尼公开赛60万美元，全英赛、马来西亚和中国公开赛为35万美元。奖金大幅增加，对球员来说应该喜闻乐见；可李永波表示，并不看好世界羽联的这一“新政”。
“这个制度存在很大的问题，非常不严谨，”李永波如此评价，“提高几站比赛的奖金，对运动员来说当然是好事。不过羽联的态度非常不严谨，我对这项制度能否持续下去持怀疑态度。同样是顶级赛事，同样的积分，为什么韩国赛的奖金就达到120万美元，其他的公开赛就只有30万美元。如果是这样的话，韩国过两年还会继续赞助吗？他们图什么呢？赞助商是傻子吗？”
在李永波看来，翻倍的奖金就应该拥有相对应翻倍的积分，那样对主办方来说才有足够的吸引力，否则30万美元就能达到的效果，赞助商凭什么愿意给更多的钱去举办相同效果的比赛。制度不合理，他很怀疑这样的赛制是否拥有长久的生命力。
“当然，今年的韩国站，我肯定把所有中国优秀的运动员都派过去，争取把奖金都赢回来！”李永波笑着说。

description.hltext_display: Llaman a reconocer que hay terrorismo
学英语只须八大技巧不再难
description.content:
(联合电讯社/北京)--很多同学在考试时候，英语总能考很高分，但一到考口语的时候就总部不及格，这是为什么呢?英语在线Yingyu.In的专家表示，这是因为语言环境的问题。很多时候，同学们碍于面子，怕说的不准，就从不在大家面前说。"不说"是导致同学们口语差的直接原因。
那怎样才能学好它呢?英语Yingyu.In专家建议同学们做到以下几点：
一、识字不可强记。得其句中用法，自然容易记得。
二、学英文时须学全句，勿专念单字。学时须把全句语法、语音及腔调整个读出来。
三、读英文时须耳目口手并到。耳闻、目见、口讲、手抄，缺一不可。四者备，字句自然记得。
四、"四到"中以口到为主要。英语便是英国话，如果不肯开口，如何学得说话?
五、口讲必须重叠练习，凡习一字一句必须反复习诵十数次至数十次，到口音纯熟为止。学外国语与学古文同一道理，须以背诵为入门捷径。每谋取一二句背诵之。日久必有大进。
六、口讲练习有二忌。
1忌怕羞。学者在课堂上怕羞，则他处更无练习机会。
2忌想分数。一想到分数，便怕说错，怕说错，便开口不得。最后的胜利者，还是不怕羞、不怕错、充分练习的学生。若得教员随时指正，自然可由多错而少错，由少错而纯正，由纯正而流利，甚至由流利而精通。此是先苦后甘之法。
七、读写要精。读音拼写，皆须注意。马马虎虎，糊涂了事，不但英文学不好，任何学问也学不好。
八、学时不可以识字为足。识之必然兼用之。凡遇新字，必至少学得该字之一种正确用法。以后见有多种用法，便多记住。
真正做到这八点，学英语就不再是难事了。想要学到更多英语的知识，请登录英语在线Yingyu.In。英语在线Yingyu.In作为国内优秀的英语门户网站，提供了英语学习工具，英语学习方法，英语试题资料，英语词典，英语培训等栏目，致力为为广大用户提供最实用、最新、最全面的英语相关信息。

description.hltext_display: México.- El académico de la Facultad de Medicina Veterinaria y Zootecnia (FMVZ) de la UNAM, Ricardo Czaplewski Cicero señaló que la mayoría de las iguanas que viven en cautiverio presentan deficiencias de calcio, así como enfermedades derivadas de
description.content:
Czaplewski Cicero dijo que la mayoría de las personas que tienen a uno de estos reptiles como mascota desconoce las cuidados que deben tener por lo que se recomienda abstenerse de tener una iguana como mascota o bien acudir con un experto antes de adquirirlo.
Pocos saben que estos animales necesitan estar expuestos a grandes cantidades de luz solar, mientras que la luz artificial es perjudicial para su salud. La luz solar es necesaria para que puedan sintetizar el calcio así como la vitamina D3.
Muchas iguanas domésticas sufren enfermedades similares a la osteoporosis.
Algunas señales que pueden presentar las iguanas enfermas son: mandíbula inflamada, aumento en el tamaño de los bíceps y fémures que son el signo de una fractura patológica. Además son incapaces de levantarse por lo que comienzan a arrastrarse y piel se torna de un verde pálido.
De acuerdo al experto, uno de los errores más comunes es la alimentación pues aunque las iguanas son animales estrictamente vegetarianos, no se le deben de dar frutas de consumo humano pues las altas cantidades de azúcar dañan su organismo.
Czaplewski Cicero dijo que lo adecuado es darles de comer sólo vegetales bajos en fósforos o quelantes de calcio, evitando evitar cebollas, espinacas y acelgas, porque eliminan el necesario calcio que les aportan verduras como el berro, la flor de calabaza y la hoja de diente de león.
"Una dieta apropiada consta de ensaladas basadas en, por lo menos, cinco o 10 ingredientes picados de manera muy fina, adicionada con pellets (bocadillos) especiales para iguana".
Generalmente las iguanas domésticas permanecen en peceras, olvidando que son animales que necesitan someterse a ciclos regulares de exposición solar, así como gozar de una temperatura cálida en la tarde y en la noche.
El veterinario dio como alternativa los focos de luz ultravioleta que pueden llegar a suplir medianamente la luz solar que necesitan los reptiles.

description.hltext_display: Injury at Spider-Man Halts Dec. 20 Performance; Taymor Issues Statement
description.author: Andrew Gans
description.content:
Christopher Tierney
An actor, who has since been identified as Christopher Tierney, an ensemble member/stunt double for the aerobatic title character in the Broadway show Spider-Man Turn Off the Dark, fell from a raised platform into a pit in the stage of the Foxwoods Theatre at the Dec. 20 performance, sustaining unknown injuries that required an ambulance.
A spokesman confirmed that the injured actor was a stunt double, and not rising star Reeve Carney, who plays the singing/speaking Peter Parker/Spider-Man role. It was not immediately clear if others were injured in the incident, though Playbill.com did learn that co-star Jennifer Damiano was not injured and that Tierney was the only person requiring hospitalization.
The New York Post reports that a nurse at Bellevue Hospital confirmed that Tierney, an ensemble member/aerialist in the production, was admitted to the hospital and was in stable condition. She would not provide further details about his status, although CNN reports that Tierney is listed in "serious condition," according to Bellevue Hospital spokesman Steven Bohlen. The New York Times says Tierney suffered broken ribs and internal bleeding.
After the spill, which eyewitnesses said was accompanied by a possible snapped cable or wire (indicated by a piece of equipment that fell on the audience), shouts for "911" were heard from staff. The New York Times reported that the fall may have been from a height of 8-10 feet, but some reports indicated that the height may have been higher. CNN reports that the actor fell a distance of 20-30 feet. At 12:15 AM Dec. 21, a spokesman for the show wrote in an e-mail: "An actor sustained an injury at tonight's performance. He fell several feet from a platform approximately seven minutes before the end of the performance, and the show was stopped. All signs were good as he was taken to the hospital for observation. We will have more news shortly." Actress Natalie Mendoza, who suffered a concussion during the first preview of the musical, posted on her Twitter account Dec. 21, "Please pray with me for my friend Chris, my superhero who quietly inspires me everyday with his spirit. A light in my heart went dim tonight." Actors' Equity, the labor union representing American actors and stage managers in the theatre, released this statement at 9:43 AM Dec. 21: "We were informed shortly after the accident during the performance of Spiderman. We are working in cooperation with the state and city Department of Labor on this situation. We don't have a further statement at this time." A request by Playbill.com for an interview with Equity was denied.
Equity released a second, stronger statement at 11:29 AM Dec. 21: "Actors' Equity Association is working with management and the Department of Labor to ensure that performances will not resume until back-up safety measures are in place." No performance is scheduled for Dec. 21, a scheduling decision made prior to this latest incident. The Dec. 22 matinee has been canceled; performances will resume the evening of Dec. 22. A statement from the show's spokesperson, regarding the cancellation, reads, "OSHA [Occupational Safety and Health Administration], Actors Equity and the New York State Department of Labor have met with the Spider-Man company today to discuss additional safety protocols. It was agreed that these measures would be enacted immediately. Tomorrow's matinee has been postponed and will be rescheduled. Tomorrow evening's, and all subsequent performances will proceed as scheduled." Equity released its third statement at 4:42 PM, saying that the incident was the result of "human error." The statement, in full, reads, "Actors' Equity Association worked today with the Department of Labor, OSHA and the production to determine that the cause of the accident at last night's performance of Spiderman was, in fact, human error. Further protocols are now being implemented, including redundancies recommended by Equity, the DOL and OSHA, to address this situation as well as other elements of the production. Equity continues to vigilantly monitor the production for the safety of its members." Director Julie Taymor issued the following statement: "An accident like this is obviously heartbreaking for our entire team and, of course, to me personally. I am so thankful that Chris is going to be all right and is in great spirits. Nothing is more important than the safety of our Spider-Man family, and well continue to do everything in our power to protect the cast and crew." James J. Claffey, Jr., president of Local One IATSE, also released a statement, which reads: "The leadership of Local One IATSE met today with OSHA, the New York State Department of Labor, Actors Equity Association, and Spider-Man management. The union will continue to pursue the highest level of safety on this production. For Local One IATSE, safety is and has always been paramount for everyone on stage and backstage and for the audience in front of the curtain. The union will insist that safety checks and redundancies are added to ensure the safety of everyone involved in Spider-Man. The union also sends its best wishes to stuntman Christopher Tierney and its hopes for his rapid recovery." The technically complex musical production directed by Julie Taymor, with music by Bono and The Edge, has been beset with glitches and accidents in its preview period. The several actor injuries include a concussion for a principal actress, and broken feet and broken wrists for acrobat-actors in the show.

description.hltext_display: INDEPENDENT PANEL TO PROBE CAMERONS BUS CRASH
description.author: Bernama
description.content:
PUTRAJAYA, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- The Cabinet today decided that an independent board of inquiry be set up to investigate Monday''s Cameron Highlands bus crash which killed 27 people, Transport Minister Datuk Seri Kong Cho Ha said.
He said the board would also look into the overall structure of commercial vehicle operations.
The chairman and members of the board would be appointed after the ministry sought the advice of the Attorney-General''s Chambers, he told reporters at his office here.
Kong said the prime minister was saddened by the incident and the Cabinet was "very concerned".
Twenty-five Thai tourists and the Malaysian driver and tourist guide were killed when a double-decker bus coming down from Cameron Highlands crashed onto the divider and overturned at Km15 of the Cameron Highlands-Simpang Pulai Road in what is regarded as the worst road accident in Malaysian history.

description.hltext_display: 少年軟式野球：ＦＢＣ杯 宮竹少年クが優勝
El fracaso de la 'Ley Sinde' crispa a muchos artistas
description.content: El fracaso de la Ley Sinde ha crispado a muchos artistas. Entre ellos, famosos que otras veces no han dudado en dar su apoyo al actual gobierno. Alejandro Sánz -en su twitter- les ha llamado directamente cobardes a todos. Miguel Bosé -en su facebook- dice sentirse avergonzado de algunos políticos. Alex de la Iglesia, que ya ha visto pirateada su película recién estrenada, ha pedido que actúen de una vez por todas.

description.hltext_display: Ολυμπιακός: Κανένα θέμα με � αουλίνιο!
Nestle Professional launches Chef Club in February
description.content:
Nestlé Professional is launching its “CHEF CLUB” next February to provide chefs with “inspiration and collaboration, whilst enabling exclusive access to Club offers and promotions, industry events and masterclasses”.
Emma Walker, CHEF brand manager at Nestlé Professional explained: "Supporting chefs in their ambitions and finding ways to help them achieve their goals is at the core of the CHEF brand. The CHEF Club has been developed to support chefs from all walks of life, all with very different needs and all facing very different challenges.
"We know that being a chef is about being creative, passionate and delivering culinary genius on a day to day basis. We wanted to find a way to support them throughout their career by giving them a platform to demonstrate their ambition and we believe the CHEF Club does just that.
"Whether they are looking to share information and advice with industry peers or opportunities for development and learning, or they simply want to benefit from exclusive offers, invitations and promotions which are relevant to them, the CHEF® Club can do just that. It is designed to celebrate being a chef."
To join visit www.thechefclub.co.uk or call 0800 742 842.
Words Maria Bracken 0 comments

event_or_fact.property: Supporting chefs in their ambitions and finding ways to help them achieve their goals is at the core of the CHEF brand.

description.hltext_display: Im Norden kalt, im Süden mild
description.content: Offenbach/Konstanz (dpa) - Konstanz am Bodensee ist der einzige Ort ohne Schnee in den bundesweiten Messungen des Deutschen Wetterdienstes DWD. Die Stadt im äußersten Süden Deutschlands war mit Stand vom Dienstagabend schneefrei und verzeichnete in der Nacht zum Mittwoch mit plus drei Grad eine in diesen Tagen milde Temperatur. Alle übrigen über ganz Deutschland verteilten...

description.hltext_display: 黑马中国支招:新选股必备三大原则
description.content:
(联合电讯社/北京)--炒股炒股炒的就是一个人的思维能力，考验的是一个人的灵敏性，只要你的思维方式正确了，就能从股市中获利。就比如选股，黑马中国heimacn.com得出结论认为其中的三大原则就应该遵循。
选股遵循原则一：选择沿45度角向上运行而成交量逐步递减的股票。沿45度角向上的股票走势最稳，走势最长。这正如我们把楼梯建成45度或接近45度的形状，因为这是最稳定的形状，所以我们把具备这样特征的股票称之为"楼梯股"。如果你一旦发现"楼梯股"中走势越接近45度角，而同时成交量在逐步减少的个股，那么你十有八九是发现庄家在楼道上的影子了。
选股遵循原则二：不炒处在下降途中的股票，只选择升势确立的股票。在升势确立的股票中，发现走势最强、升势最长的股票。笔者对中国股市近十年来的个股走势进行了分析，得出了如下结论：如果某只股票在某天创了新高或近期新高，那么在未来60天的时间里再创新高的可能性达70%以上;反之，如果某只股票在某天创了新低或近期新低，那么它在未来60天的时间里再创新低的可能性高达60%以上。
黑马中国专家提醒以上结论请你牢牢记住。7：3的赢面，为什么不选择30日均线昂头向上的股票而选择底部股和走下降通道的股票呢?
选股遵循原则三：买入连续涨停的个股。连续涨停的股票，大多出现在大势较好之时。沪深股市自实施涨幅限制以来，笔者对涨停后的个股走势追踪研究了数年，尤其是通过对近两年来出现过涨停的股票进行追踪统计，最后黑马中国heimacn.com再次得出以下结论：
①涨停股次日走势与其股价高低有着密切关系。可以发现，8元以下涨停股的次日收盘平均涨幅在4%以上，远远高于2.87%的平均收率，因此，介入低价涨停股的投资收益会更高。笔者还发现，介入20元以上的高价涨停股收益率也相对较高。
②涨停股次日最高点平均涨幅为5.93%，按次日收盘价计算的平均收益为2.87%。因此，如果短线介入涨停股后，次日平均收益也大大高于二级市场的收益率。即使按平均收益率推算，年收益率也至少在65%以上。
③至于个股涨停后的中期走势，则共有四种：涨停后单边上行;涨停后单边下跌;涨停后先小幅上扬后下跌;涨停后先小幅下跌后上扬。研究涨停股中期走势的目的在于：假如介入涨停股后未及时卖出，中线持有的话，收益率有多大。笔者发现，单边上行和先小幅下跌后上扬走势所占比例高达65%，即涨停股中期走势以上行的概率较大。当然，对于涨停股是否中线持有，还宜参照大盘走势及个股基本面。

description.hltext_display: Recibe Facultad de Ciencias Agrícolas el "Árbol Bicentenario"
description.content:
Dicha ceremonia se llevó acabo en los jardines de la facultad universitaria y fue presidida por el rector de la Universidad Autónoma de Chihuahua, M.C. Jesús Enrique Seáñez Sáenz, el Ing. José Treviño Fernández gerente de la Comisión Nacional Forestal, quienes a su vez estuvieron acompañados por el secretario general de la Universidad, M.D. Saúl Martínez campos y los presidentes municipales de ciudad Delicias y Rosales, Ing. Mario Mata Carrasco y el Lic. Martín Fuentes Cardiel respectivamente.
Cabe destacar que la facultad de Ciencias Agrícolas y Forestales es la primera institución del estado que recibe al también considerado como el “árbol nacional” a partir de 1921 al celebrase el primer centenario de la Independencia de México y que deberá sembrar la semilla de paz, unión, tolerancia, conciencia y respeto en nuestra sociedad.
En el mismo acto se instaló también la cápsula del tiempo en la que la comunidad universitaria y de la región centro sur del estado depositaron objetos y documentos que representan el presente de la región, misma que será abierta el 27 de septiembre de 2021 en el bicentenario de la culminación de a independencia de México.

description.hltext_display: AGGUATO NEL BRINDISINO: 28ENNE UCCISO IN STRADA
description.content:
28ENNE UCCISO IN STRADA
Un giovane di 28 anni è stato ucciso intorno alle 6.30 in un agguato, a Francavilla Fontana (Brindisi). È avvenuto in via Regina Elena: la vittima è Fabio Parisi, che era noto alle forze di polizia per piccoli precedenti penali. Sul posto sono intervenuti agenti della squadra mobile della questura e carabinieri, che stanno svolgendo accertamenti tecnici. Secondo una prima ricostruzione degli investigatori, contro il giovane ha sparato colpi di arma da fuoco un uomo poi fuggito con complici a bordo di un'automobile.

description.hltext_display: 申雪/赵宏博婚后没空儿闹别扭 幸福生活离不开回忆
description.content:
来源：中国山东网 www.sdchina.com 发布时间：2010-12-22 11:27:57
来源：中国山东网 www.sdchina.com 发布时间：2010-12-22 11:27:57
婚后生活趋向平静 尽管已经过去3个月了，但申雪仍会时时想起两人那场“轰轰烈烈”的冰上婚礼，甜蜜的笑意不自觉地飘过眼角眉梢。
今年9月的那场冰上婚礼是赵宏博为妻子申雪“圆的一个梦”。
赵宏博的2010年有两个梦。一个梦是和小雪在温哥华冬奥会上夺冠。2010年2月16日，两人以总成绩216.57的历史最高分成功圆梦。“直到现在，我和小雪仍会常常聊起我们的复出，聊起温哥华的一幕一幕，聊起那些我们经历过的点点滴滴。”赵宏博说，当初自己对于是否复出参加冬奥会是有一点点犹豫的，“小雪在关键时刻给了我很大的支持，正是她的坚强与坚持，让我们学会如何面对突变的赛场和命运。就像当年我跟腱断裂时，也是小雪给予的爱和鼓励让我重新站回冰面。没有她，我也走不到今天”。
温哥华冬奥会的金牌是两人事业上的巅峰之作，也给两人的运动生涯画上一个圆满的句号。
第一个梦想顺利实现，赵宏博马上投入第二个圆梦行动——献给妻子一个冰上婚礼。“我知道，2007年冰上求婚之后，小雪就一直等待着我能给她一个冰上婚礼，这是我欠她的”。赵宏博自己一个人忙忙碌碌筹备好几个月，他不让申雪帮忙，只让她静静地等待惊喜。
今年9月4日，在冬季运动管理中心、一干朋友和赞助商雅姿的全力支持下，一场盛大的冰上表演和两人的冰上婚礼在首都体育馆隆重举行。“那么多冰坛高手前来表演祝贺，那么多观众给予我们祝福，让我们幸福到了极点。”申雪拉着赵宏博的手，感谢爱人送给自己这个如此动人的浪漫。
婚后生活培养新爱好
在刚刚结束的世界花样滑冰大奖赛总决赛的场边，总有一个人拿着非常专业的照相机在拍摄比赛，他就是赵宏博。在他身边，申雪和自己的父母则非常专注地观看比赛。
拍滑冰是赵宏博自己不滑之后的一大爱好，“其实我早就是摄影发烧友了。我身边有很多爱好摄影的朋友，他们水平都很高，还经常给杂志提供照片，这也勾起了我对摄影的兴趣”。
赵宏博很自信地认为，至少在拍摄花样滑冰方面，自己的实力甚至高过不少专业体育摄影记者，因为他有得天独厚的优势，“摄影记者要拍很多张，也许才能选出一两张可心的，而我可能拍两张就有一张很精彩。因为我对花样滑冰太了解了，我知道运动员下一个动作漂亮之处在哪里”。
对动作的预判是赵宏博的优势，而通过镜头捕捉运动员的瞬间表情更是他的一绝，“拍摄运动员的表情我特别有感觉，比如拍日本男单选手高桥大辅，他的表情和动作特别丰富，水平很高，仅头部动作就有50多个，而中国选手才20多个，真不一样。有时候在镜头里，我就已经知道谁胜谁负了。”
婚后生活离不开回忆
本赛季花样滑冰大奖赛，中国冒出了小将隋文静/韩聪。这对年轻的组合一出道就受到国际裁判界的一致认可，这其实也离不开申雪和赵宏博的“铺路”。
申雪和赵宏博于1994年出道，参加了1996年埃德蒙顿世锦赛，当时仅获自由滑第13名、总成绩第15名。在赵宏博看来，当时以他们的表现完全应该进入前10名，“但裁判对我们不信任，动作难度很高也无济于事。因为我们当时在世界冰坛名不见经传，经常受到不公平的待遇，即便比赛中表现不错，裁判在打分上也对我们非常苛刻”。不过，他们的实力仍然迅速得到认可。就是在1996年的世锦赛上，加拿大观众很懂得花样滑冰，他们在赛后站起来给申雪和赵宏博热烈鼓掌，那次比赛的冠军甚至也没有得到这种待遇。
那时的申雪和赵宏博还不敢“奢望”世界冠军，“比赛中要是能进前10名就非常高兴了，冠军距离我们太遥远了，因为那时候的花样滑冰似乎还不是中国人的舞台”，赵宏博说，两人也曾为此茫然过，不过，最终还是坚持了下来。十几年的不懈付出终于得到回报，中国花样滑冰也终于走上世界冰坛的顶峰。赵宏博有时会有这样的感慨，“虽然好像就是一层窗户纸，但捅破它并不容易。而捅不破这层纸，中国的年轻花样滑冰选手还不知道要鏖战到何时才能出头。所以，每当看到中国选手在比赛中获得和自己的表现相称的分数时，我都会觉得很欣慰，自己的一份坚持换来这样的结果，其实比金牌更有价值”。
婚后生活没空儿闹别扭
已经退役的申雪和赵宏博现在还要经常往返于住所与首体之间。冬季运动管理中心给两人在首体公寓留了房间，让他们能经常到首体来训练，一切似乎还都是国家队的节奏。两人现在依然保持一定的训练量，目的是为了推广花样滑冰。
赵宏博说：“很多年以来，我们特别想将花样滑冰推向市场，希望用演出的形式带动人们对冰上芭蕾的喜爱。我们的冰上婚礼就是一次尝试，未来还计划把这种形式推广下去，力争明年在4个城市搞冰上芭蕾演出。以后，我们计划每年有8场或10场的演出，这种形式在欧美已经十分流行，但在中国还需要推广。”
申雪补充说：“我们的冰上演出，不仅是花样滑冰表演，还要邀请文艺界的朋友一起演出，能做到这一点，我相信肯定会不同凡响。”
此外，两人现在还经常参加公益活动，还到新疆与朋友一起捐赠了两所希望小学，并计划推出“冰天使梦想”活动，让孩子们参与到花样滑冰当中。同时，为了回报曾经的赞助商，申雪和赵宏博也会参加一些商业活动。
谈到朋友，两人最近和导演圈的朋友见面挺多，包括陈维亚等人，他们天马行空的想法让申雪和赵宏博受益匪浅，对未来推广花样滑冰也更有信心。赵宏博说：“其实，我们都是不太善于应酬的人，但有的朋友必须见面。其他地方，我们平时去的很少”。
这么多年，两人几乎没吵过架，赵宏博笑称，“我们没有时间闹别扭”。其实，关键是申雪总是体贴赵宏博。忙碌的婚后生活，两人回到家里究竟谁做饭？赵宏博说：“我们平时都是出去吃。一旦回家，也是父母过来给我们做饭。父母就住在我们旁边，以后有了小孩，照顾起来肯定也特别方便。”至于孩子计划，赵宏博说：“肯定要孩子，但时间要等合适时再说。” 本报记者 孔宁 J087
关键词：晒幸福
申雪和赵宏博的爱巢在北京亦庄。中国花样滑冰历史上的第一枚奥运会金牌和数不胜数的奖牌都挂在其中一面墙上，像璀璨的星星。

description.hltext_display: Raul Leal to Headline 2011 NEWH Leadership Conference
description.content:
- Raul Leal, president and COO of Virgin Hotels, will headline the 2011 NEWH Leadership Conference taking place at the Loews Royal Pacific Resort, Universal Orlando January 13-16th.
Leal, formerly president of Desires Hotels, joined the Virgin team in September to take the brand to the next level – hotels: “This was an opportunity to join one of the world leading lifestyle brands in an industry that I know and love,” Leal says. “Virgin’s approach to everything they do is about culture and innovation working hand in hand. The hotel business is a natural for the brand and I am honored to have been selected for this great journey.”
His speech will delve into the Virgin story, the essentials of building a hotel brand, changing consumer dynamics and how Virgin is reacting to them, and the state of the industry. “I am excited to speak at the NEWH Leadership Conference, as they are an organization helping the industry’s leaders of tomorrow through scholarships,” Leal says.
For more information on the conference or to register online go to: http://new.newh.org/leadership-conference/leadership-conference
About NEWH Leadership Conference
The NEWH Leadership Conference will be held at Loews Royal Pacific Resort, Universal Orlando January 13-16th, 2011. During the conference, attendees, leading hospitality professionals, will gain industry knowledge focused on business development and education in sustainability and leadership skills. Register before December 15th and become eligible to win a two-night stay at a Loews Resort.
About NEWH
The Hospitality Industry Network, founded in 1985, is an international non-profit organization of hospitality industry professionals volunteering to raise funds and grant scholarships for college students studying design, architecture, purchasing, and management—focused on the hospitality market. NEWH volunteers have raised more than $2.2 million by networking at local, regional, and international hospitality events.

description.hltext_display: Balotelli picks up award
description.content:
Manchester City striker Mario Balotelli believes he was a worthy recipient of Tuttosport's Golden Boy trophy as the best player under the age of 21, claiming he does not even know who fellow contender Jack Wilshere is.
Balotelli finished ahead of Arsenal midfielder Wilshere for the Turin sports newspaper's award, and reckons he was a deserving winner.
"I am delighted to receive this award," said Balotelli to Tuttosport.
"Who should have won this award but me? Two years ago I finished sixth and a year ago fourth.
"It was finally my turn.
"I don't know who Wilshere is but the next time I play against Arsenal I will keep a close eye on him.
"Perhaps I can show him (Wilshere) the Golden Boy trophy and remind him that I won it!"
The 20-year-old Balotelli, who joined City in the summer from Inter Milan, hopes this award will be the first of many as he targets domestic and European success in 2011.
"My aim is that this prize will, in the near future, transform itself into the Golden Ball Award," he said.
"To have won this award is a good omen to achieve that."

event_or_fact.property: My aim is that this prize will, in the near future, transform itself into the Golden Ball Award; To have won this award is a good omen to achieve that.
I am delighted to receive this award

description.hltext_display: Was die Autobranche in diesem Jahr bewegte
description.content:
Die deutschen Autobauer machen die Krise vergessen. BMW, Daimler, Volkswagen und die Konzerntochter Audi präsentieren sich in diesem Jahr in alter Stärke. Dem US-Konzern General Motors gelingt die Rückkehr an die Börse, in Europa tut sich GM aber schwer. Der weltgrößte Autobauer hat hingegen gewaltige Probleme. Was die Branche 2010 bewegte. BMW, Audi und Daimler wieder auf Erfolgskurs
Die deutsche Autoindustrie kann ihr Glück gar nicht fassen. Nur ein Jahr nach der Krise überschlagen sich vor allem die Premiumanbieter Daimler, BMW und Audi mit Erfolgsmeldungen. Zwischen Juli und September fährt BMW das höchste Quartalsergebnis der Firmengeschichte ein.

description.hltext_display: Albelda: "Todos sabemos que al Real Madrid le perjudican todos los árbitros y a nosotros nos benefic
description.content:
El jugador del Valencia, David Albelda, aseguro tras el empate a cero ante el Villarreal, en el que tuvieron lugar algunas jugadas polémicas, que prefería no hablar del arbitraje. "Vamos&nbsp;a confiar en la buena voluntad de los árbitros. Yo de los árbitros prefiero no hablar porque ya me han dado muchas tarjetas por Navidad", afirmó con sorna el centrocampista.Albelda se mostró irónico y comparó la situación con la del Real Madrid. "A nosotros nos favorecen mucho. Todos sabemos que eternamente al Real Madrid le perjudican todos y a nosotros nos benefician", dijo. Autor: videosatlas
